Customize: The Cost of Sea Level Rise
Story map discussing sea level rise and its economic impact on local communities in North Carolina
Hints: Add your subtitle, or delete that portion
Maximum height of the image, in pixels. 200 is default. The image will be fit into the container with its proportions kept (it won't be skewed).
Appears in map credits as "View data by..." (or leave blank)
Create link in Author Name by inserting your email or web address (or leave blank)
Insert your code repo URL to appear as link in "View code..." (or leave blank)
Appears in credits as "...code by..." (or leave blank)
